@@ -1,1137 +0,0 @@
-class Notebook:%0A    def __init__(self):%0A        self.__ligado: bool=False%0A        %0A    def ligar(self):%0A        if self.__ligado is False:%0A            self.__ligado=True%0A            print(%22Notebook ligado%22)%0A        else:%0A            print(%22Notebook ja esta ligado%22)%0A%0A    def desligar(self):%0A        if self.__ligado is True:%0A            self.__ligado=False%0A            print(%22Notebook desligado%22)%0A        else:%0A            print(%22Notebook ja esta desligado%22)%0A    %0A    def mostrar(self):%0A        status = %22ligado%22 if self.__ligado else %22desligado%22%0A        print(f%22O notebook est%C3%A1 %7Bstatus%7D.%22)%0A%0A    %0A    def getLigado(self):%0A        return self.__ligado%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        status = %22ligado%22 if self.__ligado else %22desligado%22%0A        return f%22Notebook: %7Bstatus%7D%22%0A    %0A    %0Adef main():%0A    notebook=Notebook()%0A    while True:%0A        line=input()%0A        print(%22$%22+line)%0A        args=line.split()%0A%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22end%22:%0A            break%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22show%22:%0A            print(notebook)%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22ligar%22:%0A            notebook.ligar()%0A        if args%5B0%5D==%22desligar%22:%0A            notebook.desligar()%0A%0A%0Amain()
